channel.title: Development Team [Read]
channel.description:
Right, I'm going to get straight to the point. I want to make a development team, 'a bit of information about myself' My name is Tommy, I'm 16 years old and I'm from England.
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
Who I want in my development team: I want loyal and experienced 'Coders', 'Graphics Designers' and 'Staff' If you would like to be any one of these then just comment on this or inbox me. This team is going to be the best! The Server Name Will Be 'Penthium'
Thanks, Tommy 'Penthium Staff'

item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:6, topic:501173”]LOL @ Nolan. Tommy, Just choose a different name… Here are some examples:

[ul][li]FederationX
[/li][li]LifeStylePK
[list][li]B0T
[/li][li]GrossificX

[/li][li]McDonalds

Last one’s got a bit stupid.

someone doesnt know how to make a list[/list][/list][/list][/ul]

item.title: Development Team [Read]
item.dc:creator: @TommyBot TommyBot
item.description:
@TommyBot wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:6, topic:501173”]LOL @ Nolan. Tommy, Just choose a different name… Here are some examples:

[ul][li]FederationX
[/li][li]LifeStylePK
[list][li]B0T
[/li][li]GrossificX
[list][li]Perfection
[/li][li]McDonalds
[list][li]Burger King
[/li][li]Disney
[list][li]Donald Duck
[/li][li]Mickey Mouse
[list][li]Balamory
[/li][li]TellyTubbiesScape[/li][/list][/li]
[/list]
Last one’s got a bit stupid.
(My Bullet points got loveed up O.o)
[/list][/list][/list][/ul][/quote] Haha, thanks. (Very, very much :D)

[quote=“holylouis, post:4, topic:501173”]lol i’m loling at both of u that’s not a very appealing name i’m sure mines just as bad but cmon come up with something fresh and way more appealing the name you both are using is a name saying oh ima last a month tops than ima go offline. good appeal is always good unless your game is just complete shit.and no i’m not flaming i’m just trying to give advice, bc i sure in hell wouldn’t play a game with a name like that unless it had appealing feats.also Tommy if you’re gonna go though all this trouble for a team,pick a better name for your client. or else all your effort you’ve put into this is gonna go to waste.[/quote] I see your logic, I myself just really like that name. Sorry, I’m sticking with Penthium.

[quote=“nolan2131, post:5, topic:501173”]Battle of the Penthiums’: Round 1. May the best Penthium win.[/quote] I’ll win, I know it. (See Lirim in Round 2.)

Read full topic
